text: Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation.

Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation.

What kind of a trick was this, Americans thought.

Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation.

What kind of a trick was this, Americans thought. They were left to their own devices and decided to explore space instead.

Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation.

What kind of a trick was this, Americans thought. They were left to their own devices and decided to explore space instead. The technology they advanced in was nothing short of groundbreaking.
Still, they felt slighted because they didn't even start the war. They tried to stay out of it.

Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation.

What kind of a trick was this, Americans thought. They were left to their own devices and decided to explore space instead. The technology they advanced in was nothing short of groundbreaking.
Still, they felt slighted because they didn't even start the war. They tried to stay out of it. The rest of the world should have done the same.

Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation.

What kind of a trick was this, Americans thought. They were left to their own devices and decided to explore space instead. The technology they advanced in was nothing short of groundbreaking.
Still, they felt slighted because they didn't even start the war. They tried to stay out of it. The rest of the world should have done the same. None of this would have happened.

None the less, it was time to set aside the past, and figure out why the world forced them into isolation alone.

Still, they felt slighted because they didn't even start the war. They tried to stay out of it. The rest of the world should have done the same. None of this would have happened.

None the less, it was time to set aside the past, and figure out why the world forced them into isolation alone. Was it a fear of the Americans?

Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation.

What kind of a trick was this, Americans thought. They were left to their own devices and decided to explore space instead. The technology they advanced in was nothing short of groundbreaking.
Still, they felt slighted because they didn't even start the war. They tried to stay out of it. The rest of the world should have done the same. None of this would have happened.

None the less, it was time to set aside the past, and figure out why the world forced them into isolation alone. Was it a fear of the Americans? Was it the rest of the world wanting to be the superpower? who knows.

Once Americans figured it out that they were alone in isolation, they decided to use their knowledge of space travel that no one else had quite mastered yet to just move all of America of the planet and settle on another planet.

Once Americans figured it out that they were alone in isolation, they decided to use their knowledge of space travel that no one else had quite mastered yet to just move all of America of the planet and settle on another planet. 

The first and primary planet they decided to move to was Mars.

Once Americans figured it out that they were alone in isolation, they decided to use their knowledge of space travel that no one else had quite mastered yet to just move all of America of the planet and settle on another planet. 

The first and primary planet they decided to move to was Mars. They knew how to make it a livable planet now. They started launching science and engineering ships up first to create an ionosphere to protect from the sun and space radiation. Soon after they started launching citizens there by the thousands.

What kind of a trick was this, Americans thought. They were left to their own devices and decided to explore space instead. The technology they advanced in was nothing short of groundbreaking.

Once Americans figured it out that they were alone in isolation, they decided to use their knowledge of space travel that no one else had quite mastered yet to just move all of America of the planet and settle on another planet. 

The first and primary planet they decided to move to was Mars. They knew how to make it a livable planet now. They started launching science and engineering ships up first to create an ionosphere to protect from the sun and space radiation. Soon after they started launching citizens there by the thousands. America was becoming an interstellar nation, no it had a planet all to itself now.

After around 50 more years, by some miracle of technology, Mars was green with foliage, and blue with oceans, rivers, and plenty of water. Americans lived out their time very comfortably on Mars without worrying about what was going on back on Earth anymore. Now they really were isolated, like everyone else wanted.
